title: Now they want OTT to be sanskari too
selftext:
​

Hollywood movies and American TV shows are bringing out nude scenes after nude scenes recently, be it a bunch of nude fight scenes in No Hard Feelings, The Foundation season-2, a shocking nude frontal scene in Joy Ride or even the erstwhile prude director Christopher Nolan's Oppenheimer's supposedly long nude sex scene.

There's no use of paying to watch such movies in theatres in India because they will be straight-up edited out. Our CBFC can't handle such vulgarity to be shown to our sanskari citizens.

And they keep cutting scenes of Indian films in the name of not hurting sentiments

[https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/entertainment/hindi/bollywood/news/arjun-rampal-and-diljit-dosanjhs-film-ghallughara-gets-a-certificate-with-21-cuts-from-the-cbfc/articleshow/101490793.cms?from=mdr](https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/entertainment/hindi/bollywood/news/arjun-rampal-and-diljit-dosanjhs-film-ghallughara-gets-a-certificate-with-21-cuts-from-the-cbfc/articleshow/101490793.cms?from=mdr)

I don't know why Selmon Bhoi is hosting the Big Boss 2 OTT where he wants everything family-friendly. He doesn't even want a kiss on OTT platform!

The I&B Ministry now wants the OTT to be sanskari too and has asked them not to spread "vulgarity and abuse"

[https://economictimes.indiatimes.com/industry/media/entertainment/media/will-not-allow-ott-platforms-to-demean-indian-culture-society-in-name-of-creative-freedom-anurag-thakur/articleshow/101869438.cms?from=mdr](https://economictimes.indiatimes.com/industry/media/entertainment/media/will-not-allow-ott-platforms-to-demean-indian-culture-society-in-name-of-creative-freedom-anurag-thakur/articleshow/101869438.cms?from=mdr)

Why are they so worried about fictional vulgarity and abuse shown on screen when they can't even condemn those who do vulgar crimes in real life?

​
comments:
It’s not about morality, it’s about having absolute control over citizens. What we watch, what we eat, what we hear.

Making sex a taboo and not exposing to it is going to create more problems than solutions.
Just watch p0rn if you are so horny.
